title.value: Жаброногий  рачок Artemia Salina L. как объект для исследования биологической активности оптического излучения низкой интенсивности
Gill-footed crustaceans Artemia Salina L. as an object for the biological activity of low intensity optical radiation study

journal.title: Belarus Fish Industry Problems : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Barulin, N.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)
Orlovich, V.A., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). The B.I. Stepanov Inst. of Physics

abstract.value: Fish scientific research supposes utilization of different biological objects as model organisms. Gill-footed crustaceans Artemia Salina L. represents a popular biological object in aquaculture technology, possessing the most important characteristics to be researched as a model of the influence of different physical factors on biological systems. The article presents the data of the influence of low intensity radiation of red (0.63 nm) and infrared (0.8-1.34 nm) spectral regions on the Artemia Salina L. development. The regulatory effect of the near infrared region laser irradiation located outside the electronic absorption bands of biological macromolecules, endogenous photosensitizers and dyes is discovered for the first time with respect to zooplankton. This effect is explained by direct excitation of singlet oxygen and its subsequent effect as a signal (trigger) molecule on the physiological processes in vivo.
